actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Jobs and Growth Tax Relief Reconciliation Act of 2003 to make permanent the treatment of dividend income as capital gains.

summary.text: Amends the Jobs Growth and Reconciliation Act of 2003 to repeal the sunset on the provision providing for the treatment of dividend income as capital gains.

titles.title: To amend the Jobs and Growth Tax Relief Reconciliation Act of 2003 to make permanent the treatment of dividend income as capital gains.
